subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just the fact!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_1fc9e2b9-9585-4c0b-8984-115c315489b1_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Yeah, it could be the boxes, and any of this kind of technolgy works diffe=
rent for everyone, but Moon claims all others users get "false communcation=
", or only the "bad guys", and I say he has no right, and no authority to m=
ake that assertion. 
 
 Yes, I did hear a voice that said "Edison here", wa=
s it Edison?, who knows, and no other meaningful information was heard by m=
e. 
 
 As for the "technicians", I have never gotten anyone claiming to be =
a technician from the other side, nor have I goten any technical assistence=
 what so ever for any voice from the boxes. I get only unknow voices that t=
alk about a network connection, I have no idea who they are , or what the n=
etwork consists of.  
 
 I don't give a crapp who uses the box, and what th=
ey use if for, until one user or another claims to be the only authority on=
 the box.  Claiming all others are only getting demons, or false voices, an=
d opening portals, is false, and deliberatly false to in an attempt to desc=
redit any compeditors.  $500 an hour for box access is criminal! 
 
 Portal=
s is Hollywood! 
 
 
 I'm not the one that said harmony.  
 
 Frank-S


To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: babiarz3@...: Fri, 30 Nov 2007 01:2=
2:49 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just the fact!




Chris was the first and=
 only person testing this device for quite sometime, making him the "primar=
y tester". The dictionary defines the word"primary" as being or standing fi=
rst in a list. You offer that he wasalso the first to understand how it was=
 supposed to be used. Yet, nowas more and more people weigh in with their o=
wn opinions you questionyour initial judgment. The fact is that Chris' opin=
ion of how the boxshould be used has never changed. He has held steadfast t=
o hisbeliefs. That, my friend, is an honorable trait in this field and afac=
t that should be considered. Chris has also never claimed this technology t=
o be his own. He hasalways and will always give credit where credit is due.=
 He does thisboth publicly and privately. The use of syntax here on whether=
 we call it Frank's Box, TheTelephone to the Dead, Maxi/Mini Box, or Granol=
a in a can is of noimportance. Truly, because Edison's plans were never dis=
covered thereis no way to know for sure whether or not your plans are exact=
ly whatEdison was working on. There also seems to be a bit of confusion on =
the role the"technicians" play in this along with another syntax issue ( co=
uld thewords network and technician be used interchangeably?). Thetechnicia=
ns are not interpreters. They can provide assistance to thosespirits too ex=
cited or otherwise unable to communicate effectively.And they, the technici=
ans, also serve to assist higher vibrations comethrough (just as your "netw=
ork"). They can also be of benefit whenlower vibrations try to get through.=
 You state you heard a voice say "Edison here" and awhile back you hadposte=
d that you did believe it to in fact be Edison himself. Yet nowyou say the =
"supposed" Edison conversation. As for portals... I've made my concerns cle=
ar previously known.However, I have witnessed the box being used in one loc=
ation only tohave activity spike in another. I've also heard many other sto=
riesrelated to dark or lower entities. So, perhaps you have had noexperienc=
es yet but, others have and they are speaking up. You repeatedly state that=
 Chris is a good guy but then you say "if hecan't use it in an honest manne=
r..." What could be more honest thansomeone sticking to the same beliefs he=
's held since day one? Whatcould be more honorable than stating his fears a=
nd providing what hefeels is a needed warning? Frank, isn't it possible tha=
t you two both bring something separate tothis device? You, the technology =
and science said. Chris, the mediumand spiritual side. Someone posted separ=
ately here about Chris' ego. I can say this...having concern for the possib=
le negative fall out to unsuspectingpeople is in no way ego ridden. To assu=
me that you know Chris'intentions is full of ego. To claim that he only wan=
ts to preventothers from having a device for selfish reasons, is ego's way =
oftelling you that you and everyone else "deserves" to have what we donot f=
ully understand. Ego won't let you consider that because "youwant what you =
want when you want it".BTW- when the word "harmony" is referred to here it =
is not a "feelinginside" like self esteem or some other warm fuzzy. It is a=
boutresonance, vibrations, that which will be matched by like resonanceand =
vibrations. Harmony. --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks=
-boxes@...> wrote:>> > I did, from the begining open this to anyone, and I =
am not amusedthat one person would take the technogoly, claim it as his own=
, andattempt to make it exclusive to himself. For one person to say he isth=
e "primary tester" is inaccurate, he was the first that kindaunderstood how=
 it was supposed to be used, or so I thought. I think weleft the "treting p=
hase" some time ago, perhaps it's time to returnbarrowed equipment?> > I wa=
sn't quite finished with that e-mail-- I hit the send button inmy rush to g=
et off to work. > > > > I put out a box use guideline thing a year or two a=
go stating thatno one has the right to take my equipment and and claim thei=
r usesupercedes anyones else's use, or results.> > So, to contiue...> > As =
a far as "technicians" I don't get any of that stuff, but---theydo talk abo=
ut a network, and connection to our equipment. When I firstmade my "Ghostma=
n" box, last week, it wasn't working well, but a dayor so later, it came to=
 life, and one of the voices said it had beenconnected to "the network". Su=
pposedly there is a similar connectionmade to computers running EVPmaker. I=
'm not sure if these "network"connections are maintained if equipment is ta=
ken out forinvestigations, or demostrations. Of cousre, I can't say if thes=
enetworks are a fact. I would think as maker of the box, these etherictechs=
 might want to give me, or others some hints.> > As far as the ghost box, o=
r Frank's box, being a "telephone to thedead", I think is very poor analogy=
, the old style phone system ofEdison's day had operators, plural, not one =
person that recieved allcalls, then interpreted what was being said to othe=
r parties. That'smore of a master control schema.The old phone system didn'=
t charge youan arm and a leg to talk to someone in the same room either! So=
memight say these "Technicains" are the operators, but even if anyoneesle c=
ould hear these voices, why do you need someone to interpretwhat's being sa=
id. I say if not many can hear it, or somethingsimilar, it ain't real! Ther=
e is a certain kind of conatct, ion thatthat your own mind uses the noise a=
s a sort of psychic prop, you hearthe stuff in your head, it may be accurat=
e and real inforamntiion, butno one else is going to hear it. i think that =
what all this supposedconverstions wiht Edison maybe. I have in fact heard =
a voice thatsaid "Edison here" but there was no other real information conv=
eyedthat I could understand. > As for portals, demons and evil spirits ente=
ring the world throughthese "unauthorized" boxes, I an only say, as the ori=
ginal mker of thebox, I have gotten voices cuzzing, swearing, name calling,=
 and eventhreatening, but nothing that has seemingly "entered" our world. E=
venthose "threatening entities", when pressed to bring it, fold up likepape=
r tigers. These beings and spirits already exist all around us,and at a hig=
her level, so they have full access to this, a lowerlever. Besides. There i=
s that "network" that seem to allow for bettercontacts, and kinda helps hig=
hter being to come through. > > I made these "boxes"! The idea was not "Edi=
sons Telephone..." WhatI got was an assemblage of my own expereince and kno=
wlegde, puttogether by my own mind as answer to my question of what else co=
uld Iuse for spirit comuncation. All technology involved was based on whatI=
 had worked on in the past for radio experimentation. I had in fact,a coupl=
e years before my interest in EVP, been experimenting withvoltage tunable r=
adio modules removed from car stereos for AM DX,that's listening to distant=
 AM radio stations. I was hoping to findother talk shows similar to Art Bel=
l, and there used to be one out ofCincinati(?). The idea of using a random =
voltage to tune the radio wasafter using EVPmaker, which uses a method of g=
enerating random speechbits for the entities to use. It was a small leap to=
 apply the randomtechnique to an anolog system. I am not the first to be fo=
cusing on aproblem, and have the mind provide an solution in complete form.=
Nothing mystical about it. The fact is, after much work, andexperimenting, =
the tuning doesn't have to be random, a linear tuningworks much better. Yet=
 another fact of the box, covienently ignored.> > What really chaps my hide=
, as maker of the box, is to have someone,who knows nothing of electronics,=
 and technology completely ignoreeverything I say about the box, and presum=
e to tell me how it reallyworks, how it should be used, and what is accepta=
ble from it. This guyis so honest, he won't even use his real name, but huf=
f and puff at atanyone that contradicts his use of my equipment. I say, as =
"a Tester"if you can't use it in an honest manor, bring the stuff back--tes=
tingover! Like it or not, the public has this technology, you can keeppissi=
ng and moaning, trying to spread fear, or you could choose theway of Light.=
 > > Frank-S> > > > > > > > _______________________________________________=

Yeah, it could be the boxes, and any of this kind of technolgy =
works different for everyone, but Moon claims all others users get "false c=
ommuncation", or only the "bad guys", and I say he has no right, and no aut=
hority to make that assertion. <BR>
 <BR>
 Yes, I did hear a=
 voice that said "Edison here", was it Edison?, who knows, and no other <U>=
meaningful</U> information was heard by me. <BR>
 <BR>
 As for th=
e "technicians", I have never gotten anyone claiming to be a technician fro=
m the other side, nor have I goten any technical assistence what so ever fo=
r any voice from the boxes. I get only unknow voices that talk about a netw=
ork connection, I have no idea who they are , or what the network cons=
ists of.  <BR>
 <BR>
 I don't give a crapp who uses the box,=
 and what they use if for, until one user or another claims to be the only =
authority on the box.  Claiming all others are only getting demons, or=
 false voices, and opening portals, is false, and deliberatly false to in a=
n attempt to descredit any compeditors.  $500 an hour for box access i=
s criminal! <BR>
 <BR>
 Portals is Hollywood! <BR>
 <BR>
&nb=
sp;<BR>
 I'm not the one that said harmony.  <BR>
 <BR>=

 Frank-S<BR><BR>
